_sText:
Final Version:

This version contains a secret ending:
To open the fourth gate you need to press themn in a right order but handle them with care XD
See last pic
after 150 downloads i will post the 1. spoiler
after 300 the 2.
after 500 the 3.

so download it and add it o nyour servers

After 10days i release the final version now:

final changelog:

addet 4 endings
1. knife
2. awp
3. bhop
4. secret

Heres a vid of all secret nades:

<object width="480" height="385"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/v7ynH7kkUiM?fs=1&hl=en_US"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/v7ynH7kkUiM?fs=1&hl=en_US" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="480" height="385"></embed></object>

addet an additional breakable ground at end
increased brightness on t side
add sound effects on some traps
increased the volume of musicnade

v2 changelog:

Fixed bugged explosions trap that kills ct miles away and reworked spawning fire gems (better texture)
Addet breaking ground at end of map
Cosmetic upgrades at beggining
Addet "Ragnara" image from Terranigma at beginning
Retexture some places
replaced Glass texture at t side with invis texture so it should be bright enought for t to see ct
addet little flames to show where traps beginns to make it more predictable
addet afk killer at beginning

v1.2 changelog:

-fixed a missing texture from a gate (however this missing texture was not gamebreaking but its ugly to see pink squares thaks nomy to inform me however on my testing pc i didnt looked at the door LOLXD

v1.1 changelog:

-fixed missing lava texture (packrat fail) thx to nomy for informing me
-changed muik from muisiknade to a better fitting theme
-more optimisations (smaller map size in MB)

My new deathrun map

50CT Spawnpoints
4T Spawnpoints

5 Secret Nades

>1 Musicnade
>1 Healnade

1.Trap: Crystal Field
2.Trap: Lava Pit
3.Trap: Rotating Plattform
4.Trap: 2paths> one is deadly
5.Trap: Cone Lightning
6.Trap: Wind Crystals
7.Trap: Explosions + Fire Gems (3 will break on touch and open way to secret nade)
8.Trap: Energy Vortex
9.Trap: Fire
10.Trap: Prison
11.Trap: Fire Diamond
12.Trap: Circle of Power
13.Trap: Astral Sphere

not all traps are listet there :)
Most Traps are dmg based and do not kill you instant

Pathway support big room to peform bhop
